blogPost.title: Just 8.4% of the world’s population live in a “full democracy” according to The Economist Intelligence Unit’s latest Democracy Index https://t.co/iqlCF546UX
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 根据经济学人智库最新的民主指数，全球仅有8.4%的人口生活在 "完全民主 "中，https://t.co/iqlCF546UX。
根據經濟學人智庫最新的民主指數，全球僅有8.4%的人口生活在 "完全民主 "中，https://t.co/iqlCF546UX。

previous.title: Pete Buttigieg has been confirmed by the Senate to lead the Department of Transportation. Last year, he spoke with @AnneMcElvoy on “The Economist Asks” podcast. Listen here https://t.co/fWdRt2d31g https://t.co/syMsThGdsk

localize.full_text: Pete Buttigieg已被参议院确认领导交通部。去年，他在 "The Economist Asks "播客上与@AnneMcElvoy进行了交流。在这里收听 https://t.co/fWdRt2d31g https://t.co/syMsThGdsk
Pete Buttigieg已被參議院確認領導交通部。去年，他在 "The Economist Asks "播客上與@AnneMcElvoy進行了交流。在這裏收聽 https://t.co/fWdRt2d31g https://t.co/syMsThGdsk

next.title: Hundreds of babies born to surrogate mothers in Russia and Ukraine were stranded after their intended parents were unable to collect them due to covid-19 travel restrictions https://t.co/vMo1cAaN1E

localize.full_text: 由于covid-19旅行限制，俄罗斯和乌克兰数百名代孕妈妈所生的婴儿因其原定父母无法接回而滞留https://t.co/vMo1cAaN1E。
由於covid-19旅行限制，俄羅斯和烏克蘭數百名代孕媽媽所生的嬰兒因其原定父母無法接回而滯留https://t.co/vMo1cAaN1E。
